channel.description: Recent content in Releases on MATE Desktop Environment

item.title: MATE 1.24
item.description:
Released: February 2020

Download MATE 1.24 packages from GitHub releases.

Core Components

Package Description Download
mate-desktop Core desktop library tar.xz
mate-session-manager Session manager tar.xz
mate-settings-daemon Settings daemon tar.xz
mate-panel Desktop panel tar.xz
mate-control-center Control center tar.xz
marco Window manager tar.xz
mate-menus Menu library tar.xz

Applications

Package Description Download
caja File manager tar.xz
pluma Text editor tar.xz
atril Document viewer tar.xz
eom Image viewer tar.xz
engrampa Archive manager tar.xz
mate-terminal Terminal emulator tar.xz
mate-calc Calculator tar.xz
mate-system-monitor System monitor tar.xz
mate-utils Utilities tar.xz
mozo Menu editor tar.xz

Libraries

Package Description Download
libmatekbd Keyboard library tar.xz
libmatemixer Audio mixer library tar.xz
libmateweather Weather library tar.xz
mate-common Common build files tar.xz

Applets & Plugins

Package Description Download
mate-applets Panel applets tar.xz
mate-indicator-applet Indicator applet tar.xz
mate-sensors-applet Sensors applet tar.xz
caja-extensions Caja extensions tar.xz
caja-dropbox Dropbox integration tar.xz
python-caja Python bindings tar.xz

System Components

Package Description Download
mate-power-manager Power management tar.xz
mate-screensaver Screen saver tar.xz
mate-media Volume control tar.xz
mate-notification-daemon Notifications tar.xz
mate-polkit PolicyKit agent tar.xz
mate-user-share User sharing tar.xz

Themes & Extras

Package Description Download
mate-backgrounds Desktop backgrounds tar.xz
mate-icon-theme Icon theme tar.xz
mate-user-guide User documentation tar.xz

Release Notes

See the MATE 1.24 release announcement for detailed changes.

item.title: MATE 1.28
item.description:
Released: February 2024

Download MATE 1.28 packages from GitHub releases.

Core Components

Package Description Download
mate-desktop Core desktop library tar.xz
mate-session-manager Session manager tar.xz
mate-settings-daemon Settings daemon tar.xz
mate-panel Desktop panel tar.xz
mate-control-center Control center tar.xz
marco Window manager tar.xz
mate-menus Menu library tar.xz

Applications

Package Description Download
caja File manager tar.xz
pluma Text editor tar.xz
atril Document viewer tar.xz
eom Image viewer tar.xz
engrampa Archive manager tar.xz
mate-terminal Terminal emulator tar.xz
mate-calc Calculator tar.xz
mate-system-monitor System monitor tar.xz
mate-utils Utilities tar.xz
mozo Menu editor tar.xz

Libraries

Package Description Download
libmatekbd Keyboard library tar.xz
libmatemixer Audio mixer library tar.xz
libmateweather Weather library tar.xz
mate-common Common build files tar.xz

Applets & Plugins

Package Description Download
mate-applets Panel applets tar.xz
mate-indicator-applet Indicator applet tar.xz
mate-sensors-applet Sensors applet tar.xz
pluma-plugins Pluma plugins tar.xz
caja-extensions Caja extensions tar.xz
caja-actions Caja actions tar.xz
caja-dropbox Dropbox integration tar.xz
python-caja Python bindings tar.xz

System Components

Package Description Download
mate-power-manager Power management tar.xz
mate-screensaver Screen saver tar.xz
mate-media Volume control tar.xz
mate-notification-daemon Notifications tar.xz
mate-polkit PolicyKit agent tar.xz
mate-user-share User sharing tar.xz

Themes & Extras

Package Description Download
mate-backgrounds Desktop backgrounds tar.xz
mate-icon-theme Icon theme tar.xz
mate-user-guide User documentation tar.xz

Verifying Downloads

Each tarball has a corresponding SHA256 checksum file on GitHub. To verify:

wget https://github.com/mate-desktop/mate-desktop/releases/download/v1.28.2/mate-desktop-1.28.2.tar.xz
wget https://github.com/mate-desktop/mate-desktop/releases/download/v1.28.2/mate-desktop-1.28.2.tar.xz.sha256sum
sha256sum -c mate-desktop-1.28.2.tar.xz.sha256sum

Release Notes

See the MATE 1.28 release announcement for detailed changes.
